name: Explorer (MyronSA)
description:
A simple platformer with three different types of randomly generated levels. Six levels for each playthrough.

Controls:

Arrow keys:   Move

Space:               Jump

X:                         Use whip

X + UP :              Shoot

X+ Down:        Drop Bomb

Hints:

Use bombs to destroy traps.

Search jars for the key to the exit in the pyramid stages.

You can press "r" at anytime to newly generate the current level.
